articles.title: Axiata, Telenor, Digi sign agreements to merge Malaysian mobile ops - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Axiata Group Bhd, Telenor Asia Pte Ltd and Digi.Com Bhd have signed the transaction agreements for the proposed merger of Celcom Axiata Bhd and Digi.

articles.title: Man refuses to wear mask properly on MRT, asks fellow passenger 'are you a police dog?' - AsiaOne
articles.description: Some train passengers travelling on the East-West Line last week (June 15) became uncomfortable when a man who wasn't wearing his mask properly confronted those trying to correct him. One of them shared her side of the story by sharing a video of the incident…
articles.content:

articles.title: Sensex Plunges Over 500 Points, Financials, Autos Lead Losses - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Asian stocks dropped on Monday as investors mulled the implications of a surprise hawkish shift last week by the U.S. Federal Reserve
articles.content:
Tata Motors, M&M, ICICI Bank, SBI and IndusInd Bank have lost 1-2 per cent each on BSE

articles.author: Siti Rohani
articles.title: Crazy Rich Asians star Henry Golding opens up about fatherhood - CNA
articles.description: The Snake Eyes actor said the arrival of his daughter in March has been "life changing".

articles.title: Hong Kong study finds 'substantial' antibody-level difference between BioNTech, Sinovac jab recipients - AsiaOne
articles.description: Amount of antibodies does not directly reflect individual’s level of protection, but researcher notes increasing evidence that higher levels generally correspond with greater immunity against infection

articles.title: Actress Kate Yeung working as security guard due to Covid-19 limiting acting opportunities - AsiaOne

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines do not increase risk of miscarriage, foetal anomaly: KKH doctor cites study in response to letter - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - There is no evidence of increased risks for mothers-to-be who take a Covid-19 vaccine, said experts. Data from nearly 4,000 pregnant women in the United States showed there was no greater risk of miscarriage, foetal anomaly or pre-term labour, sai…
